children.value: üöÄ Welcome to
hummingbot
version 0.22.0! In this release, we added an external pricing source feature, addressed a number of bugs, and continuously working on the Liquidity Mining infrastructure.
üìä External Pricing Source

By default, pure market-making strategy uses the order book‚Äôs mid price to calculate limit order prices. We added a feature that allows you to use another mid-price from external sources such as another exchange, data feed, or an external API.
You may read through
External Pricing Source Configuration
in the user manual for more information.
üîó Radar Relay upgrade to 0x v3

The Radar Relay connector is broken right now because they recently moved their API to a new version. You may encounter errors or bugs when using the connector in this version. We will send an announcement in future release notes once Hummingbot‚Äôs connector is updated.
üìì Documentation updates
Here we list recent significant changes to Hummingbot docs:
Added
Hummingbot Help Center
Added External Pricing Source Configuration in Pure Market Making strategy
Added steps in the Troubleshooting section on how to locate the data folder where hummingbot_trades.sqlite folder is stored when running via Docker
Added information in the Troubleshooting section about Binance
Removed Bitcoin.com Exchange since this is no longer supported
üêû Other bug fixes
Thanks to everyone who reported bugs!
Note that we pay bug bounties to anyone who reports a bug that we end up fixing.
Fixed issue on Windows when running pure market making strategy on multiple orders mode:
Fixed generic syntax on trading pair symbols not working:
Fixed unexpected errors when running pure market making with zero balance:
Fixed a bug with Dolomite during start up:
Fixed WebSocket connection errors when using Liquid connector:
Fixed clock de-sync with Binance timestamp on Windows:
Fixed KeyError: ‚ÄòETH-CNY‚Äô on Liquid connector:
‚öôÔ∏è Miscellaneous updates
Added
list encrypted
command to display all encrypted files in conf folder
Added order expiration feature to pure market making for 0x Mesh orders
Trading pair fetcher fix for Radar Relay migration
Temporarily removed Radar Relay from being tested in the discovery strategy unit tests since Radar Relay has recently moved on to a different API
Updated docker scripts to map data folder to easily access SQLite local database file where orders and trade data are stored
Minor fix on Bamboo Relay unit tests
üöÄ Coming soon
Here's what we are currently working on that we expect to ship in the next 2-8 weeks:
Developer tutorial on building custom strategies
KuCoin
connector (in progress
Bitfinex
connector (in progress
HitBTC
connector (in progress
gate.io
connector
